txt.en: This scavenger hunt card has a list of things to find. They could be anywhere!
Year 3 Trifles: This Time With Feeling I

Cards hang from the Party Tree. Each card contains a scavenger hunt to complete at your own pace.

<rgb=#FF0000>HINT: You will need to play the following instances to find some of these foes:
Garth Agarwen: Barrows
Carn Dûm
Sammath Gûl</rgb>
You completed a scavenger hunt card!
Vrarz is not in the mood
Ivar is not impressed by your parlor tricks
Your song soothed the beast, but only for a moment
Wave Bye to The Ring-Forge of Orthanc
Smoke with Rook (The Lord of Pinions)

Every year in the spring, the Anniversary Scavenger Hunt takes place to celebrate a very special occasion.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Do a Handstand for Ivar the Blood-hand
Gorothúl knows not what shame is
Rook will not forget the great times you have spent in each other's company
